en.title: üìÑ Work experience
en.meta_description: This is my work experience as a Software Developer

timeline.description: I joined this company as a Junior Software Developer to rebuild its MVP using JavaScript as the main language. I worked mainly in the construction of a Single Page Application using Angular.js, Bootstrap Material, and Firebase. Also, I contributed to the development of a back-end application based on Node.js, Sails.js, and MongoDB
I worked part-time on some web projects as a freelancer

I worked on this company as a Full-stack Software Developer, Senior Software Developer, and Tech lead. The main stack we used to use on almost all projects was: React, Node.js (Serverless), and GraphQL. In the last time, we started to adopt Prisma.io as ORM for the back-end. Also, I worked on the construction of one mobile app using React Native/Redux/GraphQL. In my Tech lead role, my main responsibilities were to give support to the team and design the front-end architecture for a few projects
